Description:
6676sqm of Prime Development Potential
Zoned residential, located in Officer’s prime residential district, this amazing opportunity on approximately 6676m2.
Take advantage of this land being directly next to proposed and current schools, proposed Community Centre and right next to the proposed neighborhood Activity Centre
Officer has so much to offer with regular Trains to the City, local shops, doctors, schools and great café’s making this one of the most sought after suburbs in the south east region.
Existing home comprising of 3 bedrooms with great shedding would make a perfect rental property whilst waiting for plans and permits (STCA)
If you have been searching for that special property that can setup your future or if you are and astute developer or investor then this property is one not to be missed. Call or email for more information as I would love to assist in this exceptional and rare opportunity.

Description:
A Premium quality home
Define this spectacular custom built 34 square luxury home, situated on a 3416sqm allotment featuring an in-ground swimming pool encompassed by landscaped gardens and sail covered entertainment area. Boasting 4 generous sized bedrooms, full en-suite to the master bedroom plus huge walk-in robe, study, elegant formal dining living room, sensational Granite kitchen with stainless steel appliances includes 900 mm stove, pantry, stunning meals family room flowing through to the Rumpus room, with solid Sydney Blue gum polished floor boards. Internal access from the double garage with remote via the large well equipped laundry. Added features are 9ft.ceilings, gas ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, ducted vacuum and so much more.
Externally a 20m x 12m tradesmen’s shed - separately metered with shower and WC.
This wonderful family home is situated within walking distance of Officer Primary School and just 5 minutes from Berwick’s premier schools, shops, cafes and hospitals.

Description:
The Complete Package
Delivering impressive end-to-end living and entertaining, this stylish single-level residence positioned in the heart of the Arcadia estate Officer is an opportunity that all buyers will envy.
Beyond the attractive 14 metre street frontage and landscaped gardens, step inside to a plush lounge with the appropriate size for tranquillity. In addition, you’re welcomed to the comfortably enticing open-plan family room and meals with the provision of 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 living spaces, ducted heating. Also equipped with a remote double garage with internal access, which ensures for immediate liveability or astute investment while you set out plans for the future.
The master bedroom consists of a walk in robe and ensuite, whilst the other 3 bedrooms are all serviced by the main bathroom and include built in robes.
Stepping outside on to the 448m2 block with groomed garden beds and a concreted alfresco area is ideal for relaxation and summertime pleasure.
The home sits in a premier position in close proximity to; exclusive private schools, shopping centres, a 10 minute (approx) walk to Cardinia station and close access to freeway.
If you’re not only looking for a quality home in a sought after location but also an agent who will take the time to explain the buying process in detail, then call Nicola to arrange your private inspection today!

Description:
IMMACULATE TOWNHOUSE!
This immaculately featured townhouse provides elegance, space and location which is sure to impress upon first inspection.
Enticing three spacious bedrooms upstairs with the master suite entailing ensuite and walk in robe, the other two bedrooms have built in robes and share the main bathroom and toilet. The sheer class and quality is truly complemented throughout the home with open plan living downstairs with flawless kitchen boasting ample amount of cupboard and bench space and stainless steel appliances.
Outside you are welcomed with an appealing façade and double car remote access garage. Low maintenance courtyard at the back of the home is ideal so you can sit back and relax and enjoy all that the townhouse has to offer.
Located in the Arena Estate, you are a very short walk to the arena shopping village where you have the added luxury of a Woolworths supermarket and plenty of specialty stores. Within close proximity to the newly finished Cardinia Road train station and the M1 freeway, access into the city has never been easier.
If you’re in the market for a townhouse that you can simply move into and not lift a finger then this one is for you, call today to arrange an inspection as this will not last long.

Description:
BANKSIA WELCOMES YOU HOME
Land $229,500
Package start from $371,850
Welcome to Banksia, A gateway to a lifetime of harmony---
Your next home in Melbourne?s South East, One of the fastest growing suburbs with rich local history
Title registration
approx April 2017,
65% Sold
Lots selling fast ,
An opportunity to live in an exclusive development comprising of only 92 lots along with local convenience shopping.
This established community with a rich heritage in a wonderful environment ideal for happy healthy living.
With excellent schools, local shopping, community facilities and easy access to Melbourne and surrounds, Banksia has the best on offer in Beaconsfield and Officer!
Banksia has its own convenience retail centre
• Easy access via the M1 to CBD in just 45 minutes
• Walking distance to the New Officer Town Centre
• With lot sizes from 268m2 to 512m2
• A wide range of allotments and frontages from 9m2 to 16m2 to suit your home design
• Over 11 public and private schools to choose from ? Officer, Berwick ,Beaconsfield and Pakenham with more on the way
• Fast NBN internet network
• Easy access to the Monash Freeway
• 2 mintues drive to officer train station
• Walking distance to bus routes 837,838 to
Westfield Fountain Gate shopping centre.
• Parklands active & passive
At Banksia estate, it is time to build your dream home!
Cardinia Shire includes the major centres of Pakenham and Officer, experiencing solid economic activity, benefiting from its proximity to major transport infrastructure as well as significant natural features and is currently growing by an average of five families a day.
Officer enjoys abundant public transport services with many people commuting daily to Melbourne CBD and surrounds.
??The Cardinia Shire has experienced the fastest growth in all of Melbourne metropolitan regions and by 2031 it is expected to accommodate between 65,000 to 85,000 more households and employment growth of 100,000 to 140,000 jobs?.? (source Shire website)
Whether you?re a first home buyer, wishing to downsize or a spacious family home, you?ll find the right size allotment to suit you.

Perfect for Investors!!
This home is an absolute delight and is situated in a high demanding area of Officer and is conveniently located close to transport links to the Cardinia Road Train Station, M1 Freeway as well as the area's newest schools and trendiest shopping centres, restaurants and cafes and it also sits opposite a gorgeous lake and park.
Only five years young this modern home offers buyers the opportunity to snatch up a family home like no other as it comprises of a main living zone which incorporates family living and dining areas as well as a Chef's kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances including a freestanding oven and cooktop.
Featuring three bedrooms that are on offer, the master with a walk in robe and its very own en-suite; the remaining bedrooms comprise of built in robes.
With neutral tones throughout, ducted heating, two split systems and a single remote garage with internal access this home is ready and waiting for you as it is sure to tick all the right boxes. Call now to make your dreams a reality.

Description:
Instant Attraction with a lasting appeal!
With just 4 years of age and positioned in the highly sought after Arena Estate in the fast growing suburb of Officer, this spacious Porter Davis Home is bound to charm the fussiest of First Home Buyers and Investors with its quality inclusions, functional floorplan and prime location.
With an ideal Eastern orientation and meticulous construction, this home presents 3 Living Areas/Rumpus, 4 good sized Bedrooms with the Master Bedroom boasting a WIR and an En Suite, a Study and an Al Fresco area with Café blinds perfect for entertaining. Open Plan kitchen with S/S Appliances, Walk in Pantry, 900mm cooktops and Stone Benchtops adds to the homes long list credentials. Looked after as a loving family home deserves to be, the quality inclusions also ensure an energy conscious and low maintenance lifestyle for years to come.
A delightful surprise package, features like Ducted Heating, Evaporative Cooling, Remote Controlled Double Garage, BIRs in all Bedrooms, Garden shed, Side Access, Large side access, and carefully manicured front and back gardens bring the functionality of this lovely residence to whole new level!
Prime positioned, you are within short distance to Cardinia Road Train Station, Pakenham Lakeside Primary School and College, Arena Shopping Centre, multiple childcare centres and a plethora of other businesses and shopping centres in and around Officer. With easy access to Princes Highway and M1, you will never be too far from your desired destination.
To register your interest, please come to the Open Home or contact us to take you through privately.
*PHOTO I.D. REQUIRED UPON INSPECTION*

Description:
NEST OR INVEST!
OFFICER: This prime piece of real estate is perfect for a young family, first home buyer or a savvy investor, rewarding the new owner with future capital growth as this suburb continues to boom!
From the moment you enter this home, you will be greeted with warm neutral tones throughout. There is nothing to do except move in, unpack and relax!
The master suite is complete with a WIR and a full ensuite whilst bedrooms 2, 3 and 4 all have double robes and are in close proximity to the family bathroom with separate bath and shower facilities.
The hostess kitchen being the central hub of the home, offers ample cupboard space, a tiled splashback and a great sized pantry. Quality appliances include a 600mm 4 burner hot plate, wall oven, range hood plus a stainless steel dishwasher, all overlooking the dining and family room with convenient outdoor flow.
Other features of the property include ducted heating, split system air conditioning and a double garage with internal access.
Perfectly positioned, it's just a short walk to the new Cardinia Railway Station, Lakeside Square Shopping Centre with local cafes and take way shops, primary and secondary schools and an eight hectare regional reserve offering sporting grounds and open parkland. Seamless freeway access is close by.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that the vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*

Description:
Modern Family Home
Find yourself immersed in exceptional design tailored to utilise space, central to all amenities and facilities including shopping centres, public transport and easy access to freeways. Located in the highly sought after suburb of Officer, 23 Heathfield Lane, is waiting for you!
This is the perfect opportunity for all, suiting an investor, a family or a first home buyer this home is certainly one to see.
The home comprises of 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and a double lock up remote garage.
You can expect all the usual perks of a quality home, two living areas, an undercover entertaining area, and good sized bedrooms with built in robes, ensuite and walk in robe to the main. The bathrooms are a stand out in the home, the ensuite offering an oversized shower and the main bathroom offering a spa bath. Zoned ducted heating, split system cooling, ducted vacuum and alarm system as standard
The exceptional décor and overall design of the home compliments everyday living to a level where this home is a walk in, do nothing scenario! Quality fittings and fixtures are evident from the moment you enter including stainless steel appliances, gas cooking, under bench oven, stone benches, carpet to bedrooms and easily maintainable tiles to wet areas.
If you’re not only looking for a quality home in a sought after location, fantastic views but looking for an agent who will take the time to explain the buying process in detail, then call Nicola to arrange your private inspection today!

Description:
Tranquil Lakeside Stunner
Exclusively situated with a tranquil lake backdrop in the esteemed Arcadia Estate, this exquisitely presented family home feels brand new, with stylish carpets and sparkling tiles all complemented by the elegance of high ceilings. Flowing along the central entrance hall, the lounge room provides an instant sense of calm, continuing through to the rear of the home where an open plan kitchen, meals and family room showcases stainless steel appliances and a convenient breakfast bench. Enticing you out, a sunny deck relishes in its glorious aspect overlooking the lake and nature trails, while the low-maintenance backyard ensures your weekends are yours to enjoy. Family accommodation is easily catered for with the four robed bedrooms, including the master with walk-in-robe and ensuite, supplemented by a family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. With quality appointments including ducted heating, split system air conditioning, recycled water plus double garage with internal access. Meeting the needs of families, the home rests within close proximity to Arena and Lakeside shopping precincts, Cardinia Train Station, schools, parkland and the M1 Freeway.
Photo ID required at all open for inspections.

Description:
Overlooking the Wetlands
Overlooking wetlands and extensive parkland in the sought after suburb of Officer is this brand new double storey home. This home features extensive open plan living areas including a lounge room, family/meals area and a rumpus room with split system air conditioning and direct access into the double garage. The kitchen is centrally located with a massive walk in pantry, caeser stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances including 900mm gas hotplates. The master bedroom is privately located upstairs with a luxuriously appointed ensuite and a large fitted walk in robe. The remaining 3 bedrooms are all downstairs and feature built in robes and are well serviced by the main bathroom. Fully fenced and landscaped, this home is well finished with timber laminate flooring, quality carpet, gas ducted heating, downlights throughout, rear access through the garage and much more. Close to public transport and walking distance to the new Caridnia Club this home is a must to inspect. This home is also eligible for the first home buyers grant.

Description:
OPEN CANCELLED SAT 29/10
This 1 year young, 45sq, 5 bedroom, Arden built home is bursting with quality and appeal and will capture your interest from the moment you step inside. Located in the new Potter?s Grove Estate, you are surrounded by quality homes and adjacent to the central park ? this home screams ?family?.
Downstairs you are greeted by the stunning entryway and sizable study ? living needs are well and truly catered for with theatre room, separate rumpus room and the eye-catching open plan kitchen, dining and living zones. The kitchen itself is an entertainer?s dream of style and sophistication with 40mm stone waterfall benchtops, under mount sink, soft-close pot drawers and stylish overhead cupboards, complemented by a lavish butler?s pantry. Quality Smeg appliances complete the package with 900mm free-standing stainless steel stove and dishwasher.
Upstairs you?ll find the 4th living area and all your accommodation needs met with 5 bedrooms. The master is a grand suite with views over Officer from the private balcony and boasts a sizable walk-behind robe and full ensuite with double stone-topped vanity and oversized shower. Of the 4 remaining bedrooms, 2 have walk-in robes, and 2 have built-in robes and are all serviced by the beautiful, stylish family bathroom.
Other notable features include ? Refrigerated cooling, ducted heating, ducted vacuum, high ceilings, quality fixtures and fittings throughout, extra wide garage for ample storage, large 633sqm block with alfresco area and so much more ? inspection is a must.

Description:
BANKSIA WELCOMES YOU HOME
Land $211,500
Package start from $211,500
Welcome to Banksia, A gateway to a lifetime of harmony---
Your next home in Melbourne?s South East, One of the fastest growing suburbs with rich local history
Title registration
approx April 2017,
65% Sold
Lots selling fast ,
An opportunity to live in an exclusive development comprising of only 92 lots along with local convenience shopping.
This established community with a rich heritage in a wonderful environment ideal for happy healthy living.
With excellent schools, local shopping, community facilities and easy access to Melbourne and surrounds, Banksia has the best on offer in Beaconsfield and Officer!
Banksia has its own convenience retail centre
• Easy access via the M1 to CBD in just 45 minutes
• Walking distance to the New Officer Town Centre
• With lot sizes from 268m2 to 512m2
• A wide range of allotments and frontages from 9m2 to 16m2 to suit your home design
• Over 11 public and private schools to choose from ? Officer, Berwick ,Beaconsfield and Pakenham with more on the way
• Fast NBN internet network
• Easy access to the Monash Freeway
• 2 mintues drive to officer train station
• Walking distance to bus routes 837,838 to
Westfield Fountain Gate shopping centre.
• Parklands active & passive
At Banksia estate, it is time to build your dream home!
Cardinia Shire includes the major centres of Pakenham and Officer, experiencing solid economic activity, benefiting from its proximity to major transport infrastructure as well as significant natural features and is currently growing by an average of five families a day.
Officer enjoys abundant public transport services with many people commuting daily to Melbourne CBD and surrounds.
??The Cardinia Shire has experienced the fastest growth in all of Melbourne metropolitan regions and by 2031 it is expected to accommodate between 65,000 to 85,000 more households and employment growth of 100,000 to 140,000 jobs?.? (source Shire website)
Whether you?re a first home buyer, wishing to downsize or a spacious family home, you?ll find the right size allotment to suit you.

Description:
CONVENIENT COUNTRY LIVING
This lovely little farmlet situated on a bitumen road only 6 minutes to Berwick has all the benefits ready and waiting for you. The property is extremely well fenced into 12 paddocks and also having laneways and troughs which is ideal for horses or cattle. A comfortable brick veneer home has been tastefully renovated and comprises three bedrooms, open plan living, modern kitchen and enjoys a pleasant rural outlook. There is also a bungalow that could be used as guest accommodation or an office – it’s yours to choose. Very convenient, plenty of shedding, mains water, ideal for those who need the convenience of quality schools and the acreage lifestyle. Inspect today!!

Description:
The Eve 35 - Ex Display
Introducing a stunning residence in the sought after Timbertop Estate, Officer. Golden hued Oak floors run throughout the open plan living, dining and kitchen area. Large sliding doors retract to seamlessly connect the interiors with the covered, alfresco and integrated BBQ area. Also boasting;
- 4 Spacious bedrooms, master with sumptuous ensuite and walk in robe
- Light filled designer kitchen with double oven and walk in pantry
- Beautifully landscaped gardens
- High ceilings, ducted heating and cooling throughout
This is an exceptional home in a highly sought after neighbourhood, be quick to secure this property as opportunities as good as this are rare.

Description:
A perfect starter in Officer
From the moment you enter this home, you will realise there is nothing you will need to do except move in, unpack and relax! Located in the peaceful Arcadia estate, this modern near new family home will complete your house hunting.
The home comprises of 4 bedrooms, the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, whilst the other three bedrooms have built in robes. The heart of the home being the kitchen, offers the highest of quality, from the Caesar stone benches, glass splash back, dishwasher, to the 900mm stove. The kitchen also overlooks the dining and family room with views to the stunning covered alfresco area making it perfect for entertaining guests.
Extras to this home are a stand out, no expense has been spared to make sure you are in comfortable surroundings in your own home, some of the key features include; high ceilings, ducted heating, split system cooling, double glazed windows, 7 star energy rating, floor boards, double garage with internal access and a great location! Other features outside the home include stunning front façade, coloured concrete to back yard and plenty more.
Close to schools, shops, train station and bus services. Inspection is a must!

Description:
Premium Horse Property on 20 Acres (approx.)
Situated in Officer, central to Beaconsfield and Pakenham Townships is this premium 20 acre (approx) horse property with a recently renovated home. Indoors boasts 3 bedrooms, open living, brand new, stone kitchen bathroom and laundry, heating and cooling. Outdoor improvements are extensive, including a studio/home office with en suite, 12 fully fenced paddocks, shedding and mains water. The land is made up of usable, most cleared paddocks, ideal for horses or cattle. Situated in a rural pocket of vibrant Officer makes for convenient living, being so close to schooling, shopping centres and sporting facilities. At such an affordable level of buying, this property is expected to be short lived on the market.
Contact Amanda Charles – 0400 347 968
